title: Refrigerator Hinge Bearing
description: Refrigerator Hinge Bearing ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 58 Reviews PartSelect Number PS976452 Manufacturer Part Number 240328203 Sold individually.

installationInstructions.author: Charles from Cypress, TX
installationInstructions.title: Door was making a popping sound when opened and closed
installationInstructions.content: Unscrewd the top hinge cove and removed two bolts from the hinge, lifted door off of the bottom hinge and laid the whole door on the floor using a beach towel to protect it from scratches. Unbolted the bottom hinge plate, replaced it with the new one. Then pulled out the old hinge bearing and replaced with a new one. Installed the door back on the bottom hinge while the magnet on the door strip held it place and rebolted the the upper hinge and reinstalled the hinge cover. All done in less than 10 minutes. No more popping sounds when I open and close the door!
